context_bundle.summary: Centralized workflow orchestration pattern where DC coordinates task distribution, dependency resolution, and result aggregation for worker agents

onboarding.quick_start: DC acts as orchestrator: distributes tasks to workers (VSSC, KALIC, WEBC, CMDC), tracks state, handles failures, aggregates results
common_patterns: Hub-and-spoke: DC (hub) coordinates all worker agents (spokes)
Task distribution: Send commands via request/response to specific agents
State tracking: Maintain workflow state with task statuses
Error handling: Retry failed tasks or abort workflow
Result aggregation: Collect outputs from workers, synthesize final result
known_errors: DC becomes single point of failure (requires checkpointing)
Centralized bottleneck with many concurrent workflows
